alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 10:57AM MDT until June 15 at 4:14AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River at Hailey affecting Blaine County. .The Big Wood and Big Lost Rivers reached minor flood stage last night and will continue at or above flood stage for at least tonight, with the Lost River expected to lower below flood stage on Wednesday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, or 2254 cfs... Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM MDT Monday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM MDT Monday was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.8 feet on 05/19/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 4.9 Mon 10 am MD 4.4 3.7 3.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
